title: Ijiwaru Baasan (1996)
synopsis: Grandma is a nasty and manipulative thing most of the time, causing endless trouble for her son-in-law and daughter, her grandchildren, and her neighbours.
staff: [['Wada, Kaoru', ['Music']], ['Hasegawa, Machiko', ['Original Creator']], ['Kurahashi, Shizuo', ['Sound Effects']], ['Nagao, Hitoshi', ['Art Director']]]
